String.string: [Event—Daily] Skyrockets in Flight
Always with reverence in your heart…
Balder will protect you.
"I got it."
Flame of Sacrifice
Before you is the Flame of Sacrifice.
Go to the Flame of Sacrifice.
Use a Remembrance Rocket.
You set off a Remembrance Rocket.
Flame of Honor
Before you is the Flame of Honor.
Go to the Flame of Honor.
Use a Remembrance Rocket.
You set off a Remembrance Rocket.
Flame of Mercy
Before you is the Flame of Mercy.
Go to the Flame of Mercy.
Use a Remembrance Rocket.
You set off a Remembrance Rocket.
"Thanks. Perhaps I'll see you again tomorrow."
Talk to Modan.
